page.title: 04Tourism
page.content: The most popular reason for coming to Castle Douglas was for shopping. People said that they liked the town as people were friendly and the countryside around was lovely. We asked if it needed any improvements and some people said it needed a few more shops. Most said it needed a better swimming pool. Some said it would be better if it had a leisure centre or something like that. Quite a few people said it was very tidy and had hardly any litter. One family we asked said they were staying near and from what they had heard it was a nice town and wanted to stay out for the day.
